original_text: Now, when Titus thinks about you, he loves you even more. He remembers that you were ready to obey him. You respected his authority and you received him into your homes.
korean_text: 그가 너희 모든 사람들이 두려움과 떪으로 자기를 영접하여 순종한 것을 생각하고 너희를 향하여 그의 심정이 더욱 깊었으니

sentences.original_text: Now, when Titus thinks about you
He remembers that you were ready to obey him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희가 그에게 순종할 준비가 되었음을 기억한다

sentences.original_text: and you received him into your homes
